parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.54

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the material of the given selection on all computers in a network session.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> obj '''setObjectMaterialGlobal''' [selection, material]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [selection,material]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> selection: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> material: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setObjectMaterialGlobal]] [0, "A3\Structures_F\Data\Windows\window_set.rvmat"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setObjectTexture]], [[setObjectTextureGlobal]], [[getObjectTextures]], [[setObjectMaterial]], [[getObjectMaterials]]
</value></part></template>
